Kunwarpur Chintamanpur railway station is a halt railway station on Muzaffarpur–Gorakhpur main line under the Samastipur railway division of East Central Railway zone. This is situated at Kundia, Kuwarpur in East Champaran district of the Indian state of Bihar.
